  • Classes in com.xebisco.yield used by com.xebisco.yield
    Class
    Description
    AbstractBehavior
    Provides an abstract implementation of the Behavior interface, tracking the number of frames since its activation and defining the lifecycle of a behavior.
    AbstractRenderable
    Abstract class representing a renderable component in the application.
    AbstractTexture
    This abstract class represents a texture in the application.
    Animation
    Represents an animation made up of multiple frames.
    AnimationPlayer
    The AnimationPlayer class is a component behavior that handles the playing of animations by updating the texture rectangle with the current frame.
    Application
    This class represents the main application.
    AudioPlayer
    The AudioPlayer class is a component behavior that allows for playing, pausing, and manipulating audio clips in a Yield application.
    Axis
    Represents an input axis with two keys for positive and negative directions.
    Behavior
    This interface represents a behavior that can be started and updated over time.
    ChangeSceneTransition
     
    Color
    This class represents a color with RGB or ARGB format.
    Color.Format
    This enumeration is used to specify the format of the color value when creating a new `Color` object.
    ComponentBehavior
    Abstract class representing a behavior that can be attached to an Entity2D.
    ComponentCreation
    Represents a creation of a component with a specific behavior and modifier.
    ComponentModifier
    A functional interface that represents a modifier for a component's behavior.
    ContextTime
    Represents the timing context for an application, encapsulating time-related properties such as delta time, timescale, and target sleep time.
    Entity2D
    Represents a 2D entity within a game or application.
    Entity2DContainer
    This is a class that represents a container for Entity2Ds, allowing for instantiation and removal of entities.
    Entity2DPrefab
    The Entity2DPrefab class is a blueprint for creating 2D entities with components, children, and tags.
    EntityStarter
    This interface represents a starter for an entity of type Entity2D.
    FileInput
    This class represents a file input with its path and format.
    Input.Key
    Enumeration for keyboard keys.
    Input.MouseButton
    Enumeration for mouse buttons.
    ObjectAnchor
    Enum representing different object anchors for entities.
    OnDemandTexture.ReturnIOManager
    The ReturnIOManager interface provides a method to get the FileIOManager.
    OnDemandTexture.ReturnTextureManager
    The ReturnTextureManager interface provides a method to get the TextureManager.
    OnlyModifiableBeforeCreationException
     
    PlatformInit
    PlatformInit is a class that represents the platform initialization settings.
    RectangleMesh
    RectangleMesh class extends AbstractRenderable and represents a rectangle mesh object.
    Renderable
    Represents an object that can be rendered by a Renderer.
    Scene
    The Scene class represents a scene in a 2D environment.
    SystemBehavior
    An abstract class representing a system.
    TextMesh
    TextMesh class extends AbstractRenderable and represents a text mesh object.
    Transform2D
    A class representing the transformation of a 2D object.
    Vector2D
    Represents a 2D vector, points and sizes.
